description: A comprehensive household management application that helps families and roommates coordinate chores, track expenses, and manage their shared living space efficiently.
business_objectives: Reduce household conflicts through clear task distribution
Improve financial transparency in shared expenses
Provide a user-friendly platform for household coordination

key_features.name: Authentication System
key_features.description: Secure user authentication with email/password and social login options
acceptance_criteria: Users can register with email and password
Users can login with valid credentials
Password reset functionality works
Session management is secure

key_features.name: Household Management
key_features.description: Create and manage households with multiple members
acceptance_criteria: Users can create new households
Users can join existing households with invite codes
Household admins can invite new members
Member roles and permissions are managed correctly

key_features.name: Chore Management
key_features.description: Create, assign, and track household chores
acceptance_criteria: Users can create new chores with details
Chores can be assigned to specific members
Chores can be marked as complete
Recurring chores are supported
Chore progress is tracked and displayed

key_features.name: Expense Tracking
key_features.description: Track and split household expenses among members
acceptance_criteria: Users can add new expenses
Expenses can be split among multiple members
Balance calculations are accurate
Payment tracking is available
Expense history is maintained

key_features.name: Dashboard
key_features.description: Overview of household activities and statistics
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays key statistics
Recent activities are shown
Progress tracking is visible
Quick actions are available

key_features.name: PWA Features
key_features.description: Progressive Web App capabilities for mobile use
acceptance_criteria: App can be installed on mobile devices
Offline functionality works
Push notifications are supported
Responsive design works on all devices

frontend.forms: React Hook Form with Zod validation

user_stories.title: As a household member, I want to create a household so that I can start organizing our shared space
acceptance_criteria: I can enter household name and description
I become the admin of the household
I receive an invite code to share with others

user_stories.title: As a household member, I want to join an existing household so that I can participate in household management
acceptance_criteria: I can enter an invite code
I am added to the household as a member
I can see the household dashboard

user_stories.title: As a household member, I want to create chores so that tasks are clearly defined
acceptance_criteria: I can enter chore name and description
I can assign the chore to a specific member
I can set due dates and recurrence patterns

user_stories.title: As a household member, I want to mark chores as complete so that progress is tracked
acceptance_criteria: I can see my assigned chores
I can mark chores as complete
Completion is recorded with timestamp

user_stories.title: As a household member, I want to add expenses so that we can track shared costs
acceptance_criteria: I can enter expense amount and description
I can split the expense among members
The expense is recorded in the household ledger

user_stories.title: As a household member, I want to view the dashboard so that I can see household overview
acceptance_criteria: I can see household statistics
I can see recent activities
I can access quick actions

security.data_encryption: All data encrypted in transit and at rest

reliability.error_handling: Graceful error handling and user feedback

success_metrics: Task completion: Percentage of chores completed on time
User satisfaction: App store ratings and feedback
Feature adoption: Usage of key features
constraints: Must work on modern browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
Must integrate with Supabase for backend services

risks.mitigation: Implement proper data encryption and access controls
Focus on user experience and onboarding
